question: Which decade is named as the "Decade of Healthy Ageing", as per the World Health Organisation (WHO)?
explanation:
The World Health Organization (WHO) has designated 2020-2030 as the "Decade of Healthy Ageing". International Day of Older Persons is observed on October 1 every year.
United Nations designated this day to focus on the well-being and special needs of the elderly people. The UN theme of the International Day of Older Persons 2020 is “Pandemics: Do They Change How We Address Age and Ageing?”.
